# spacelift_spaces (Data Source)

`spacelift_spaces` can find all spaces in the spacelift organization.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "spacelift_spaces" "this" {
}

output "spaces" {
  value = data.spacelift_spaces.this.spaces
}
```
